affordability_index.long_description: The Affordability index is developed to measure the proportion of income spent on housing and transportation.The index of affordability is calculated by combining housing and transportation costs in a neighborhood and dividing that number by income.We extracted the affordability index by using H+T index.H+T index have three different affordability index to account for different households like Regional Typical Household, Regional Moderate Household and National Typical Household
affordability_index.short_description: Affordability index is developed to measure the proportion of income spent on housing and transportation
